text: Gei David ga helekai gi Abishai mo ana gau aamua huogodoo boloo, “Dagu dama daane donu e hagamada bolo ia e daaligi au. Malaa, goodou e homouli gi di hai o tangada i di madawaawa Benjamin deenei eiaha? Dimaadua ne hai gi mee bolo gi haga halauwa ina au, malaa, diagia a mee, dugu anga gi heia dana mee dela belee hai.
